BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing a retirement savings board to oversee the city’s retirement savings program for certain self-employed individuals and employees of private entities, and setting forth powers of the comptroller and other provisions in relation to such program
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing a retirement savings board to oversee the city’s retirement savings program for certain self-employed individuals and employees of private entities.
